commit message: Performing network stuff outside UI thread. Changed icon. Progress dialog. Fixed regex bug where comic #681 couldn't be understood.
Fixed FileNotFound when going beyond end of comic. Added image loading progres dialog. Scraping now works even when T-Mobile messes up the HTML. Fixed various loading cancellation bugs.
Fixed some concurrency/ race condition issues. Fixed bug where cancelling the first load makes next/prev buttons FC.
Fixes issues #10, #6: Forgetting which comic is open on orientation change; FC on orientation during loading.
Fixes issue #9: Soft keyboard opening due to edittext having focus on start (still need to validate).
Moved hover button to menu. Spaced out buttons evenly.
Added random button (issue #7). Chosen by fair dice roll. Guaranteed to be random.
Replaced fake random (xkcd #221 reference) with real random.
